biocontainers.name: metacluster
biocontainers.summary: MetaCluster5.1 is a new software for binning short pair-end reads

biotools.summary: Unsupervised binning method for metagenomic sequences. Existing binning methods based on sequence similarity and sequence composition markers rely heavily on the reference genomes of known microorganisms and phylogenetic markers.

bioschemas.name: MetaCluster
bioschemas.summary: Unsupervised binning method for metagenomic sequences. Existing binning methods based on sequence similarity and sequence composition markers rely heavily on the reference genomes of known microorganisms and phylogenetic markers.
